code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-hot-toast';import{useEffect}from'react';import CheckAuth from'../functions/checkAuthLogged';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResetPassword(){const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{CheckAuth(navigate);});const[email,setEmail]=useState();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const emailRegex=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(!email){toast.error('Prosím vyplňtě email.');}else if(!emailRegex.test(email)){toast.error('Zadejte prosím email ve správném formátu. (example@gmail.com)');}else{axios.post('http://localhost:3001/resetPassword',{email}).then(res=>{if(res.data.Status==='Success'){toast.success("Email byl úspěšně odeslán.");navigate('/login');}else{toast.error(res.data.Error);}});}};const Zpet=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-4 col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-4",style:{marginBottom:50},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{style:{marginBottom:20},children:"Zapomenut\xE9 Heslo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:"Zadejte v\xE1\u0161 email pro zasl\xE1n\xED odkazu na obnoven\xED hesla"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",style:{marginBottom:50},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-4 col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",className:"form-label",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"email",type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"example@gmail.com",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4 col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:Zpet,className:"btn-border-radius-lg form-control btn btn-outline-secondary",children:"Zp\u011Bt"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-border-radius-lg form-control btn btn-outline-secondary",children:"Poslat"})})]})})})]})]})});}export default ResetPassword;
